label: Market Trend Timeline
description: Explore market trend signals over time for selected industries, categories, benchmarks, and regions.

defaultOutputs.name: Trend ID
defaultOutputs.description: Unique identifier for each detected market trend.

defaultOutputs.name: Trend Name
defaultOutputs.description: Human-readable name or label for the market trend.

defaultOutputs.name: Yearly Signal
defaultOutputs.description: Array capturing the trend signal per year within the selected time horizon (e.g. interest, volume, score).

defaultOutputs.name: Evaluation
defaultOutputs.description: Summary evaluation of the trend (e.g. Emerging, Growing, Mature, Declining) based on yearly signals and benchmarks.

configSchema.label: Industry
configSchema.description: Choose the primary industry lens for the trend analysis.

configSchema.label: Category
configSchema.description:
Select one or more market categories. Mapped from the screenshot:
- **Industry: Consumer Health** → Hair & Scalp Health, Skin Health, Digestive Health, Sleep & Stress
- **Industry: Pharmaceuticals** → Dermatology, Neurology, Cardiometabolic
- **Industry: Supplement** → Metabolic Support, Cognitive Health, Joint & Mobility, Immune Support

configSchema.label: From Year
configSchema.description: Start of the time horizon for the trend timeline (inclusive).

configSchema.label: To Year
configSchema.description: End of the time horizon for the trend timeline (inclusive).

configSchema.label: Region (Optional)
configSchema.description: Optional geographic focus for the trend analysis. Leave empty for global view.
